body:
Features and Enhancements

Component
  • NEW: Network360 Logo Library
    • Network360 now supports the ability for Clients to manage their own report logos.
      Where: Network360 -> Settings
      New Tab: Branding
      Limitations: Brokers and Consultant User Profiles cannot manage report logos

      New Features by Client Role:
      Client Admins:
      • Can Manage Report Logos in their Logo Library
      • Upload one - to a maximum of ten (10) logos
      • Remove a logo from the Logo Library
      • Set a logo as Active/Inactive:
      • Active: One or more Logos that can be used on Exports
      • In-Active: Logo WILL NOT be available for use on Exports
      • Set logo as Default to appear on ALL Exports
      • Preview logo on mock report cover page
      Client Users:
      • Can see who uploaded a logo and when that happened
      • Can select a logo from the existing Library to add to a report
      • Preview logo on mock report cover page
  • Provider Profile Interface Enhancement
    • Client Users are now able to see a much more streamlined interface on the Provider Attributes screen.
      Previously, a list of Provider Attributes were displayed.
      While they appeared grouped by Level (1, 2 or 3), in many cases, the list could be long and challenging to review.
      Now, users will see a collapsible icon next to each unique Level on the Provider Attributes screen.
      Users will be able to click to expand/collapse the different Levels.
      By default, Network360 always displays the individual Levels as collapsed.

Issues Fixed

Component
  • Competitive Dashboard
    • Fixed the CSV Export so state field value appears in the proper colum when users select: Group by MSA.
  • Network360 Error Messaging
    • User will now see the proper error message in Network360 instead of an empty white screen.
